item.title: LD29 Density Datasheet
item.content: Technical specifications for Low-Density 29kg/m3 cross-linked polyethylene foam. Includes compression stress and thermal conductivity values.

item.title: Anti-Static EPS Safety Guide
item.content: Handling and storage guidelines for ESD-safe foam materials used in electronic component packaging.

item.title: CNC Foam Cutting Manual
item.content: Operational manual for our custom CNC foam cutting services. Details precision tolerances and supported file formats (DXF/A-CAD).

item.title: ISO 9001:2015 Certificate
item.content: Official quality management certificate for RoyalFoam manufacturing processes and customer service excellence.

item.title: Fire Retardant Grade XLPE Specs
item.content: Detailed specifications for our Flame Retardant (FR) grade cross-linked polyethylene foam, matching UL-94 standards.
